info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 11:54AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Pima, southwestern Cochise and northeastern Santa Cruz Counties through 1245 PM MST... At 1154 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Sierra Vista, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sierra Vista, Benson, Whetstone, Huachuca City, St. David, Tombstone, Kartchner Caverns State Park, Fort Huachuca, Fairbank and Charleston. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 between mile markers 307 and 311. Route 80 between mile markers 294 and 328. Route 82 between mile markers 41 and 67. Route 90 between mile markers 293 and 332. Route 92 between mile markers 322 and 325. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
